definitions.body: worm, grub, vine-weevil Jon 4:7, De 28:39 (coll.); devouring the dead Is 14:11 (coll.: ‖[[רִמָּה ]]), Is 66:24 (coll.) symbol of insignificance Is 41:14, Job 25:6 (‖[[רִמָּה ]]), Ps 22:7.

elsewh.
